details:
par.tic.u.lar.ly

[pLtIkjəlLlI; pəˋtikjuləli]

副词
(more ~; most ~)
1 特别地,尤其
(→ especially【同义字】)
I ~ asked him to be careful.
我特别要他小心
"Do you want to go?"-"No, not ~.".
“你想去吗?”“不,不特别想去
2 仔细地,详细地
I cannot explain it ~ now.
现在我无法详细说明它
